Others: The 2nd T20I of the Australia tour of England 2024 will take place on September 13 at Sophia Gardens in Cardiff, UK.
Mitchell Marsh leads Australia while Phil Salt leads England.
In the overall head-to-head records, England has won 11 games while Australia has won 12.
In the recent 5 matches, the hosts have won 2 games while the visitors have won 2.
Aaron Finch has scored the most runs for Australia against England with 619.
Cameron White has the best average of 50.83 from 8 games.
Shane Watson has the best bowling show with 4/15 against England in 2011.
Jos Buttler is the leading run-scorer for England against Australia with 584 runs.
Alex Hales holds the record for the top knock (94).
Chris Jordan and Adil Rashid have the most wickets to their names (13).
Adil Rashid has the best economy rate at 8.02 in 12 games.
England has a strong record at home against Australia, winning 6 out of 10 T20I games.
England won the only game played at Cardiff against Australia in the past in 2015.
